import React from "react"; import styles from "./OrderSummary.module.css"; export const OrderSummary = ({ subtotal, discount, deliveryFee, total, onCheckout, }) => { return (

Order Summary

Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Discount (-20%) -${discount.toFixed(2)}
Delivery Fee ${deliveryFee.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default OrderSummary;
